text: John Bond (fl. 1402) was an English politician. He was a Member (MP) of the Parliament of England for Leominster in 1402. Nothing further on him has been found to have been recorded.http://www.historyofparliamentonline.org/volume/1386-1421/member/bond- john ==References== Category:14th-century births Category:15th-century deaths Category:English MPs 1402
title: John Bond (MP for Leominster)
